targets.query: SELECT mean("jobs_running") FROM "sdiag" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("cpu_total") AS "Total CPU's", mean("cpu_allocated") AS "Allocated", mean("cpu_other") AS "Other", mean("cpu_idle") AS "Idle" FROM "sinfo_cpus" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname" fill(null)

SELECT mean("cpu_total") AS "Total CPU's", mean("cpu_allocated") AS "Allocated", mean("cpu_other") AS "Other", mean("cpu_idle") AS "Idle" FROM "sinfo_cpus" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname" fill(null)
SELECT mean("jobs_pending") FROM "sdiag" WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("running") AS "running", mean("pending") AS "pending" FROM "squeue" WHERE ("part" =~ /^$partition$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("cancelled") AS "cancelled", mean("completed") AS "completed", mean("completing") AS "completing", mean("configuring") AS "configuring", mean("failed") AS "failed", mean("node_fail") AS "node_fail", mean("pending") AS "pending", mean("preempted") AS "preempted", mean("running") AS "running", mean("suspended") AS "suspended", mean("timeout") AS "timeout" FROM "squeue" WHERE ("part" =~ /^$partition$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname" fill(null)
